channel.title: Help me with setting lvl for item to weald

item.title: Help me with setting lvl for item to weald
item.dc:creator: @arnelis arnelis
item.description:
@arnelis wrote:

k well im trieng to make my own skill capes.I got pretty far.Well i got the skill cape to work with emote when you weald it.Now im stuck on one part.Acually 2 if you can help.First can someone tell me how to set requirment for level i tried but i can still ptu on cape and than i only get the words even though i dotn have lvl 98 of that skill.And other thing if you could can you help me when you remove the cape so the emote would disapear.Here is the code i got so far.

if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 1007 == true){ setAnimation(1851); playerSE = 1851; playerSEW = 1851; playerSER = 1851; playerSEA = 1851; isRunning2 = false; playerEnergy = 99999; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if(playerLevel[7] <= 98) { sendMessage("You need a runecrafting level of 99 to weald this cape."); }
[glow=blue,2,300]please help[/glow][br][size=1]Posted on: January 24, 2007, 08:51:51 PM[/size][hr]anyone?

Read full topic
item.source: Help me with setting lvl for item to weald
